VTI.name: Vanguard Total Stock Market ETF
VTI.description: Provides broad exposure to the US stock market, including large, mid, and small-cap equity.

VB.name: Vanguard Small-Cap ETF
VB.description: Focuses on smaller US companies with growth potential.

VEA.name: Vanguard Developed Markets ETF
VEA.description: Covers stocks from developed markets outside the US.

VSS.name: Vanguard FTSE All-World ex-US Small-Cap ETF

VWO.name: Vanguard Emerging Markets ETF
VWO.description: Provides exposure to stocks in emerging economies.

BND.name: Vanguard Total Bond Market ETF
BND.description: Broad exposure to US investment-grade bonds, including government and corporate bonds.

BNDX.name: Vanguard Total International Bond ETF
BNDX.description: Hedged exposure to investment-grade bonds issued outside the US.
